description:
OBS Studio 30.2 enters public beta testing with native NVENC encoder on Linux with support for NVENC AV1 and shared texture support for the NVENC, QuickSync, and VA-API encoders.

The post OBS Studio 30.2 Promises NVENC AV1 and Shared Texture Support on Linux appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: OBS Studio 30.2 Promises NVENC AV1 and Shared Texture Support on Linux
